ygData.subject: Re: Skeletons and our spells
ygData.msgSnippet: Mezmerize is a spell used for retreat, once you cast mezmerize it stuns them yes, but if you attack them or any damage they will come back after you. The
ygData.messageBody:
Mezmerize is a spell used for retreat, once you cast
mezmerize it stuns them yes, but if you attack them or
any damage they will come back after you.
The Wanderer
--- Tom Fiola <tmf@...> wrote:
> From: Tom Fiola <tmf@...>
>
> Hi,
> I am an 8th level gnomish enchanter. Do our
> normal spells around this
> level work on skeletons? The last few times I have
> engaged them, I have
> cast things like Enfeeble and Mesmerize. The spells
> were not resisted, but
> there was no indication of a spell effect, as is
> normally stated when these
> spells take effect (e.g. 'Your target has been
> Mesmerized').
>
> Does anyone know what this means? I think the spells
> may have worked, but I
> am not positive. Can anyone shed any light? Thank
> you.
>
> Xinorfarin, Cazic-Thule
>
>
>
